Hydras::

Hydras placed an arm in Maxima shoulder and he said "are you 
courious my dear??? remember that curiousity killed the cat, but It 
won't kill you... See the hologram, my dear"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 8/4/03 11:33:29 PM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Hydras motioned Maxima to come in and showed her the talbe with 
the 
> > holographic image of a volcano.
> > 
> > "Come my dear"hissed kindly the male"I want to show you my... 
secret"
> > 
> > 
> > 
> 
> She followed him. Curious. 
> 
> Hiding a smile. All she had to do was gaze upon him & feel 
comfort. but, at 
> the moment, his secret was intreguing her. Curious as to what he 
would show 
> her. He obviously trusted her. & rightly so. there was no way she 
would every 
> betray him.
